{"step_by_step_thinking": "At the age of 3, a child should be able to feed themselves with a spoon. Hopping on one leg and drawing a square are skills that are typically developed around the age of 4 or 5. Catching a ball reliably is also a skill that is typically developed around the age of 4. Therefore, if a 3 year old child is not able to feed themselves with a spoon, this could be considered delayed development.", "answer_choice": "C. Feeding by spoon"}
